class.name: ButtonGroup
class.description: Group of [BaseButton]. The members of this group are treated like radio buttons in the sense that only one button can be pressed at the same time. Every member of the ButtonGroup should have [member BaseButton.toggle_mode] set to [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_buttons
method.description: Returns an [Array] of [Button]s who have this as their [ButtonGroup] (see [member BaseButton.button_group]).

signal.name: pressed
signal.description: Emitted when one of the buttons of the group is pressed.
